name: charcoal
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Fire moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Fire-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
